Customers.Tests Package
=======================

The `customers.tests` package contains unit tests and performance profiling tools for the `customers` package. These modules ensure the reliability and performance of customer-related functionalities.

Submodules
----------

customers.tests.profiler_memory module
--------------------------------------

The `profiler_memory` module provides memory profiling tools for the `customers` package.

.. automodule:: customers.tests.profiler_memory
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

customers.tests.profiler_performance module
-------------------------------------------

The `profiler_performance` module provides performance profiling tools for the `customers` package.

.. automodule:: customers.tests.profiler_performance
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

customers.tests.test_app module
-------------------------------

The `test_app` module contains unit tests for the `customers` package, covering functionalities like adding, updating, and deleting customers.

.. automodule:: customers.tests.test_app
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

Module Contents
---------------

The `customers.tests` package combines memory and performance profiling with unit testing to ensure robust and efficient customer management.

.. automodule:: customers.tests
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
